Title: Days Gone Bye
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Frank Darabont (teleplay by)
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: Deputy Sheriff Rick Grimes awakens from a coma, and searches for his family in a world ravaged by the undead.
